original_title: The Firm Body Sculpting System - Body Sculpt Blaster
overview: Body Sculpt Blaster is a total-body-shaping routine in ONLY 30 minutes! If you are short on time, this exciting workout is for you.  Favorite FIRM Master Instructor Nancy Tucker leads you through a fun mix of body-sculpting moves using dumbbells, which provide maximum variety and ultimate results.
tagline: Finding it hard to fit a workout into your busy schedule? Body Sculpt Blaster is the workout for you.
title: The Firm Body Sculpting System - Body Sculpt Blaster
